Name: Saúco Margarita
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime wedge & salt rim (optional).
Review: The floral notes of elderflower combine wonderfully with the herbaceous tequila and citrusy lime.
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly and named after 'flor saúco', which is Spanish for elderflower.
Nutrition: One serving of Saúco Margarita contains 188 calories
